text: Francis Hammel (11 December 1950 â€“ 6 January 2021) was a French politician. From 1997 to 2002, he was a member of the National Assembly. Hammel was born in Saint-Valery-sur-Somme, France. He was a member of the Socialist Party. Hammel died on 6 January 2021 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Hauts-de-France Category:People from Somme Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians
title: Francis Hammel
